DOC.brief_summary: To compare lung deposition of amikacin in two settings: spontaneously breathing through a tracheostomy cannula and through the mouth.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Tracheostomy on Lung Deposition in Spontaneously Breathing Patient
DOC.criteria: Patient who were likely to require an elective tracheostomy surgery as part as their head and neck surgery Allergy to Aminoglycosides Patients who received Aminoglycosides treatment less than one month prior the surgery Pectoralis major flap reconstruction Latissimus dorsi flap reconstruction
